homeAbout.title: About AQTRA
homeAbout.paragraph1: AQTRA is a leading engineering and contracting company dedicated to delivering integrated solutions across multiple disciplines. Our commitment to accuracy and quality is reflected in every project we undertake.
homeAbout.paragraph2: From smart home automation to sustainable solar energy systems, we combine technical expertise with innovative thinking to create solutions that enhance modern living and business operations.
homeAbout.paragraph3: Our comprehensive service portfolio includes HVAC systems, plumbing, electrical installations, and network infrastructure – all designed to meet the evolving needs of our clients.

about.overviewDescription: AQTRA Company is a leading provider of engineering solutions, specializing in HVAC, Electrical, Low-Current Systems, Smart Home & Automation and Solar Energy Solutions. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.
about.sector1Description: Comprehensive climate control and mechanical solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.
about.sector2Description: Advanced automation solutions for modern living, enhancing convenience, security, and energy efficiency.
about.sector3Description: Reliable electrical installations and low-current systems for communication, security, and data networks.
about.sector4Description: Sustainable and renewable energy solutions to reduce carbon footprints and achieve energy independence.
about.sector5Description: Innovative embedded systems and IoT solutions for smarter devices and connected environments.
about.licensesDescription: AQTRA Company holds a range of professional licenses and certifications, including Civil Defense approvals, HVAC installation certificates, low-voltage compliance, and safety and quality certifications. These credentials reflect our commitment to excellence and adherence to industry standards.
about.experienceDescription: With over a decade of combined expertise, AQTRA Company has successfully delivered projects across commercial, residential, industrial, and healthcare sectors. Our team is known for its reliability, technical accuracy, engineering quality, and exceptional project management capabilities.
about.missionDescription: To provide innovative and sustainable engineering solutions that exceed client expectations, while fostering a culture of excellence and continuous improvement.
about.visionDescription: To be a global leader in engineering and technology solutions, driving progress and creating value for our clients and communities.
valuesList: Integrity: We uphold the highest standards of honesty and transparency in all our dealings.
Innovation: We embrace creativity and strive to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
Excellence: We are committed to delivering quality and exceeding expectations.
Sustainability: We prioritize environmentally friendly practices and solutions.
Collaboration: We believe in the power of teamwork and strong partnerships.

saudiVision.title: Saudi Vision 2030
saudiVision.subtitle: A bold blueprint for transforming Saudi Arabia into a global leader in economic, social, and cultural development.
saudiVision.overviewText: Saudi Vision 2030 is a strategic framework launched in 2016 by the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to reduce its dependence on oil, diversify its economy, and develop public service sectors such as health, education, infrastructure, recreation, and tourism. It aims to position Saudi Arabia as a global investment powerhouse and a hub connecting three continents: Asia, Europe, and Africa.
saudiVision.pillarVibrantText: The goal of a vibrant society is to create a rich and fulfilling life for all citizens and residents. This includes promoting cultural and entertainment opportunities, preserving Saudi heritage, and improving the quality of life through world-class healthcare and education.
saudiVision.pillarThrivingText: A thriving economy focuses on diversifying income sources, empowering the private sector, and creating job opportunities for all. It emphasizes innovation, entrepreneurship, and attracting foreign investment to drive sustainable growth.
saudiVision.pillarAmbitiousText: An ambitious nation aims to enhance government effectiveness, transparency, and accountability. It seeks to foster a culture of responsibility and volunteerism, ensuring that all citizens contribute to the nation’s progress.
targetsList: Increase private sector GDP contribution from 40% to 65%.
Raise foreign direct investment from 3.8% to 5.7% of GDP.
Grow non-oil revenue from SAR 163 billion to SAR 1 trillion.
Improve the quality of life index ranking to be among the top 10 globally.
Increase the number of volunteers from 11,000 to 1 million.
Enhance e-government services and digital transformation.
saudiVision.impactText: Vision 2030 presents immense opportunities for businesses, society, and the global community. It fosters a dynamic business environment, attracts foreign investment, and drives infrastructure development. The vision also enhances the quality of life for citizens and residents, creating a sustainable and diversified economy for future generations.
